| A sprow:* has no hands.
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is female.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                  |

A **sprow**, C, is a type of monster that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). The sprow is a [centaur-like](/wiki/Centaur_\(monster_class\) "Centaur (monster class)") [drow](/index.php?title=Drow_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") creature that has been converted into a [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid")–[spider](/wiki/Spider "Spider") hybrid, with a humanoid torso and pairs of spider legs in place of limbs, leaving them unable to pick up items and use weapons.

Sprow have a [poisonous](/wiki/Poison "Poison") bite and a kick attack that spreads [webs](/wiki/Web "Web").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") a sprow [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") conveys [temporary](/wiki/Temporary_intrinsic "Temporary intrinsic") [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance").

## Origin

Sprow are a type of transformed drow that act as a "reverse [drider](/wiki/Drider "Drider")": this spider-hybrid transformation is often a form of punishment, but unlike driders sprow are given the least advantageous aspects of each creature.

## Encyclopedia entry

A droven punishment form combining the worst aspects of humanoids  
and spiders. Sprow combine the head and torso of a drow with the  
limbs of a spider. This form is typically inflicted on drow  
novices who see spiders as holy creatures worthy of worship,  
rather than as allegories and useful tools. It may also be  
inflicted on young drow who boast about their cunning to others.  
Unlike driders, sprow are too weak to survive alone and are not  
driven out of the droven cities, instead being used as  
slave-laborers or beasts of burden.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Sprow\&action=edit)*

Sprow

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
C sprow
Difficulty 11
Attacks Bite 1d1 poison (strength), Kick 1d1 webbing
C sprow
Difficulty 11
Attacks

Bite 1d1 poison (strength), Kick 1d1 webbing

Base level 8
Base experience 161
Speed 15
Base AC 2
Base MR 10
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1500
Nutritional value 500
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A sprow:

  • has no hands.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is female.
  • can be seen through infravision.

A sprow, C, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. The sprow is a centaur-like drow creature that has been converted into a humanoid–spider hybrid, with a humanoid torso and pairs of spider legs in place of limbs, leaving them unable to pick up items and use weapons.

Sprow have a poisonous bite and a kick attack that spreads webs.

Eating a sprow corpse or tin conveys temporary sleep resistance.

Origin

Sprow are a type of transformed drow that act as a "reverse drider": this spider-hybrid transformation is often a form of punishment, but unlike driders sprow are given the least advantageous aspects of each creature.

Encyclopedia entry

A droven punishment form combining the worst aspects of humanoids
and spiders. Sprow combine the head and torso of a drow with the
limbs of a spider. This form is typically inflicted on drow
novices who see spiders as holy creatures worthy of worship,
rather than as allegories and useful tools. It may also be
inflicted on young drow who boast about their cunning to others.
Unlike driders, sprow are too weak to survive alone and are not
driven out of the droven cities, instead being used as
slave-laborers or beasts of burden.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''sprow''', {{black|C}}, is a type of monster that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. The sprow is a [[Centaur (monster class)|centaur-like]] [[Drow (dNetHack)|drow]] creature that has been converted into a [[humanoid]]–[[spider]] hybrid, with a humanoid torso and pairs of spider legs in place of limbs, leaving them unable to pick up items and use weapons.

Sprow have a [[poison]]ous bite and a kick attack that spreads [[web]]s.

[[Eating]] a sprow [[corpse]] or [[tin]] conveys [[Temporary intrinsic|temporary]] [[sleep resistance]].

==Origin==
Sprow are a type of transformed drow that act as a "reverse [[drider]]": this spider-hybrid transformation is often a form of punishment, but unlike driders sprow are given the least advantageous aspects of each creature.

==Encyclopedia entry==

	Unlike driders, sprow are too weak to survive alone and are not
